txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Decorative sword sheaths from enemies in eastern Dunland. Collect them and deliver them to the taskmaster at Forthbrond to earn favour with Théodred's Riders.
'Well, that is a few less threats that we will need to fight in the days ahead. My thanks to you.'
'There is no shortage of opponents in these wild lands. Be careful out there.'
Théodred's Riders Task: Decorative Sword Sheaths
The Rohirrim taskmaster wants decorative sword sheaths. He can be found in the Rohirrim encampment of Forthbrond in the Isendale.
Deliver the decorative sword sheaths to the taskmaster at Forthbrond
You have accepted a task to acquire decorative sword sheaths. You are to deliver them to the Rohirrim taskmaster at Forthbrond.
Wanted: Decorative sword sheaths from enemies in eastern Dunland.
